thread.title: This female MLB executive is being considered for the Phillies' GM job, report says
thread.title_full: This female MLB executive is being considered for the Phillies' GM job, report says

author: Maria Guardado | NJ Advance Media for NJ.com
title: This female MLB executive is being considered for the Phillies' GM job, report says
text:
Comments 
Kim Ng, the senior vice president for baseball operations for Major League Baseball, is in the running to be the next general manager of the Phillies , according to a report by CBS Sports' Jon Heyman. 
Ng, who previously worked as a Yankees, Los Angeles Dodgers and Chicago White Sox executive, has secured an interview for the Phillies gig, Heyman reports. The other candidates believed to be in the mix are Ross Atkins and Larry Beinfest. 
Ng is a former softball player at the University of Chicago and is looking to become the first female general manager in the majors. 
The Phillies have a vacancy to fill following Ruben Amaro Jr.'s dismissal last month.
